email_body: see you there Enron North America Corp. From: Kori Loibl 09/25/2000 03:19 PM To: John Arnold/HOU/ECT@ECT, Mike Maggi/Corp/Enron@Enron, Brian Hoskins/Enron Communications@Enron Communications, Dutch Quigley/HOU/ECT@ECT, Errol McLaughlin/Corp/Enron@ENRON, Sherry Dawson/NA/Enron@Enron, Laura Vargas/Corp/Enron@ENRON cc: Subject: Desk Dinner I have made reservations for 8:00 Wednesday evening at Fogo de Chao. For those of us who haven't been there, the address is 8250 Westheimer, between Hillcroft and Fondren on the north side of the road. If you are not able to attend, please let me know. K.
